title: Savage eSports Looking for a Coach/analyse Pref high elo player.
body:
Savage eSports have recently taken off, building a roster of high elo players and storming into the competitive scene.

We are currently looking for someone that is willing to dedicate their time to Coach the team to improve overall performance as well as analyse our games and gain information on teams and players we'll be competing against. We'd also like you to watch the OGN/LCS and try to pick up on things their players do so we can try to manipulate their strategies and pick up on useful things such as ward locations, lane swaps etc. 

If this sounds like something you'd be interested in please fill out this application.

IGN:
AGE:
RANK:
Why do you want to become the Coach/Analyse?

replies.body:
IGN: Do It For Minky
AGE: 18
Rank: Plat 2 was Diamond 3 last season

Cause i want to show that OCE isn't just  bunch of sh1tters.
